SELECT rsv.reserve_stay_day as 'reserveVo.reserveStayDay', rsv.reserve_checkin_date as 'reserveVo.reserveCheckIn', rsv.reserve_checkout_date as 'reserveVo.reserveCheckOut',
r.room_nm as 'reserveVo.room.roomNm',
pmst.payment_state_nm as 'reserveVo.paymentState.paymentStateNm',
cp.company_address as 'reserveVo.room.company.companyAddress',
perm.member_nm as 'reserveVo.person.memberNm', perm.member_phone as 'reserveVo.person.memberPhone',
pm.payment_price as 'paymentVo.paymentPrice', DATE_FORMAT(pm.payment_finish_date, "%Y-%m-%d ") as 'paymentVo.paymentFinishDate',
comm.member_nm as 'reserveVo.room.company.memberNm'
FROM tb_reserve rsv JOIN tb_room r JOIN tb_payment_state pmst JOIN tb_company cp JOIN tb_member perm JOIN tb_payment pm JOIN tb_member comm ON rsv.room_no = r.room_no AND rsv.payment_state_cd = pmst.payment_state_cd AND r.company_id = cp.company_id AND rsv.person_id = perm.member_id AND rsv.reserve_no = pm.payment_target_no AND comm.member_id = r.company_id
WHERE rsv.person_id = #{login.memberId}
WHERE cp.company_id = #{login.memberId}
ORDER BY rsv.reserve_no DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{pagePerRow}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_payment pm JOIN tb_payment_cate pmc JOIN tb_payment_state pms JOIN tb_ad ad
ON pm.payment_cate_cd = pmc.payment_cate_cd AND pm.payment_state_cd = pms.payment_state_cd AND pm.payment_target_no = ad.ad_no
pm.member_id = #{login.memberId}
pm.member_id LIKE '%${selectValue}%'

SELECT pm.payment_no , pm.admin_id , pm.member_id , pm.payment_price, DATE_FORMAT(pm.payment_apply_date,"%Y-%m-%d ") 'paymentApplyDate', DATE_FORMAT(pm.payment_finish_date, "%Y-%m-%d ") 'paymentFinishDate', DATE_FORMAT(pm.payment_approve_date,"%Y-%m-%d ") 'paymentApproveDate',
pmc.payment_cate_nm 'paymentCate.paymentCateNm',
pms.payment_state_nm,
ad.ad_content 'ad.adContent' FROM tb_payment pm JOIN tb_payment_cate pmc JOIN tb_payment_state pms JOIN tb_ad ad
ON pm.payment_cate_cd = pmc.payment_cate_cd AND pm.payment_state_cd = pms.payment_state_cd AND pm.payment_target_no = ad.ad_no
pm.member_id = #{login.memberId}
pm.member_id LIKE '%${selectValue}%'
ORDER BY pm.payment_no DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{pagePerRow}
SELECT room_nm, room_img, room_normal_price FROM tb_room WHERE room_no = #{roomNo}

SELECT m.member_nm, m.member_phone,
p.person_total_mileage FROM tb_member m JOIN tb_person p ON m.member_id = p.person_id WHERE m.member_id = #{sessionId}
